ticket.title: Fix context firewall security findings from PR #335

in_scope: Add context firewall checks for write_allowlist and shell_allowlist.
Fail-closed when Read has no path and firewall is active.
Add unit tests for context firewall integration.
out_of_scope: New capability manifest fields beyond existing allowlists.
Changing policy engine behavior outside context firewall checks.

steps: Add firewall checks for ToolClass::Write and ToolClass::Execute.
Return ToolDecision::Terminate when Read path is None with firewall enabled.
Document DefaultContextFirewall instantiation rationale and session_id usage.
Replace informal refinement_event comments with clean documentation.
Add and run firewall integration unit tests.

criteria: Context firewall validates Write operations against write_allowlist when configured.
Context firewall validates Execute operations against shell_allowlist when configured.
Context firewall terminates Read operations with missing path when firewall is active.
ToolDecision refinement_event field has clean documentation.
New unit tests pass and clippy has no warnings.

notes.security:
Fixes fail-open behavior in the context firewall for Write/Execute and
Read-without-path cases. The firewall must remain default-deny.
